title: Pre-order the Official Tour de France Guide 2021 – with free UK delivery
content:
The 2021 Tour de France is one of the most hotly-anticipated editions of cycling’s biggest race in recent years, with a stellar field set to line-up at the Grand Départ in Brittany on 26 June.

And your build-up to the Tour starts here, with the UK’s only Official Tour de France Guide 2021 available to pre-order now, with free UK delivery.

  • Order the Official Tour de France Guide 2021

This year’s 204-page guide comes packed with profiles of every team, exclusive interviews with the contenders, stats for every rider, maps of every stage and plenty more.

Get all this in the Official Tour de France Guide 2021

  • The only official Tour de France race guide
  • Brush up on your knowledge with our Tour Legends magazine
  • Official Tour de France A2 wallchart
  • Exclusive Heroes of Brittany beer mats
  • Maps, profiles and itineraries of all 21 stages with exclusive insight from the race director
  • Exclusive interviews with the stars of this year’s race including Tadej Pogacar, Geraint Thomas, Mathieu van der Poel and many more
  • Full breakdown of the 23 teams

Who will win the 2021 Tour de France?

The 2021 Tour de France route features three summit finishes and 58km of time trials: a combination likely to result in a fiercely competitive race.

Will the 2020 champion, Tadej Pogacar, reign supreme once more, or can 2018 victor Geraint Thomas take maximum advantage of the time trial kilometres to win the race for a second time?

Or will Primoz Roglic end his wait for a Tour title, having lost out on the yellow jersey on the penultimate stage of last year’s race?

Don’t miss out – order your copy of the Official Tour de France Guide for £10.99 now.
author: BikeRadar
